/* VacationStatsMapper.ListVacationStats */
SELECT VS.VACATION_STATS_ID, VS.EMPLOYEE_ID, VS.WORK_HISTORY_ID, VS.YYYY, VS.VACATION_TYPE_CODE, CD.CODE_NAME AS VACATION_TYPE_CODE_NAME, VS.VACATION_USE_COUNT FROM HM_VACATION_STATS VS LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = VS.VACATION_TYPE_CODE AND CD.UP_CODE_ID = 'VACATION_TYPE_00' WHERE 1=1
AND VS.USER_ID = @UserId
AND VS.EMPLOYEE_ID = @EmployeeId
ORDER BY VS.WORK_HISTORY_ID DESC, VS.YYYY DESC, VS.EMPLOYEE_ID

/* VacationStatsMapper.AddVacationStats */
INSERT INTO HM_VACATION_STATS ( USER_ID, EMPLOYEE_ID, WORK_HISTORY_ID, YYYY, VACATION_TYPE_CODE, VACATION_USE_COUNT, CREATER_ID ) SELECT @UserId AS USER_ID, V.EMPLOYEE_ID, V.WORK_HISTORY_ID, DATE_FORMAT(V.VACATION_END_YMD, '%Y') AS YYYY, V.VACATION_TYPE_CODE, SUM(FN_GET_VACATION_USE_COUNT(V.VACATION_START_YMD, V.VACATION_END_YMD, V.VACATION_TYPE_CODE, @UserId)) AS VACATION_USE_COUNT, @UserId AS CREATER_ID FROM HM_VACATION V WHERE V.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND V.EMPLOYEE_ID = FN_GET_EMPLOYEE_ID(@UserId) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(V.VACATION_END_YMD, '%Y'), V.VACATION_TYPE_CODE ;SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
